sentence.Network_en: About a hundred years ago a few feeble efforts were made on behalf of the left - hander.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约一百年前,有人曾为左撇子们做过一些微不足道的努力.

sentence.Network_en: The handy left - hander left handsome handkerchief on the handle of the handbag.
sentence.Network_cn: 手巧的 左撇子 把一方标致手帕留在手提包的提手上.

sentence.Network_en: This play for a left - hander would definitely be more difficult.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个动作对左手捕手来说无疑的是比较难一点.

list.abs: I give myself a shot a week and it lowers my immune system and stops it from attacking the joints , " the left-hander said . "我每周注射一次，它降低我的免疫系统并且阻止它袭击关节，”一个左撇子说道。

21 - year - old left hander , is an outdoor sports enthusiasts ., 21 岁的左先生是一名户外运动爱好者.
The 24 - year - old left - hander had just finished his first start in the Majors ., 这位 24 岁左投完成了他大联盟出登板.

entry.def: You can describe someone as a left-hander if they use their left hand rather than their right hand for activities such as writing and sports and for picking things up.

example.ex: Left-handers have trouble using can-openers, scissors, and potato peelers.
example.tran: 左撇子在使用开罐刀、剪刀和土豆削皮器时会有困难。

means.word_mean: 1. a baseball pitcher who throws the ball with the left hand
2. a person who uses the left hand with greater skill than the right;
